summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 737, entitled "An Ordinance to prescribe the mode in which the costs and expenses of all public improvements which, by the provisions of the act of the Legislature Assembly of Washington Territory, entitled "An act to revise and amend the Charter of the City of Seattle, approved February 4, 1886, are to be provided for and paid by special assessments upon property shall be divided, apportioned, assessed and collected", approved May 28, 1886, and Ordinance No. 1321, approved April 7, 1890, and Ordinance No. 1439, approved July 12, 1890 amended said Ordinance No. 737.
